name: Muji-Inspired Notion Timeboxing Planner Template
description: Hi there!I really hope you like this minimal template. I've always loved Muji stationary and was inspired to make a Notion template in the style of a timeboxing planner. What is timeboxing?Timeboxing is a goal-oriented time management strategy to help you increase productivity and reduce procrastination. When you create a “timebox,” you’re setting a goal to finish a particular task within a specific time frame.Planning how long a task should take before getting started on it allows you to be int
features: Planning how long a task should take before getting started on it allows you to be intentional about where you’re spending your time and what you’re working on
